name: Consumer Data Management (CDM)
description: Consumer Data Management (CDM) is a centralized Consumer Information service. It is an Omni-Channel enabler, allowing multiple applications to reuse consumer master data information (CDM) from a single source of truth within an organization. This service provides the API’s required for various applications to create, update, search & Delete consumer information. It supports both Retail & Hospitality verticals.

requests.description:
Returns one or more consumers based on the find criteria. Wildcard search support with * character.

This operation is supported in both Persistence and Proxy modes.

See below for the fields supported in each mode.

Replace fieldName with any combination of the following fields.

Persistence mode supported fields:

  • profileUsername
  • salutation
  • firstName
  • middleName
  • lastName
  • effectiveDate
  • birthDate
  • gender
  • phone
  • mobile
  • fax
  • identity
  • homeStore
  • socialSecurityNumber
  • addresses.name
  • addresses.line1
  • addresses.line2
  • addresses.city
  • addresses.state
  • addresses.postalCode
  • addresses.extPostalCode
  • addresses.country
  • loyaltyCard
  • householdCard
  • alternateId
  • username
  • associateId
  • emailAddress
  • amsCustomerId
  • storedValueId

Proxy mode supported fields:

  • firstName
  • lastName
  • phone
  • alternateId
  • emailAddress
  • mobile
  • loyaltyCard
  • addresses.postalCode

Body example:{ "searchCriteria": { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Smith" }, "operator": "AND", "pageStart": 0, "pageSize": 10 }
